data.title: Elizabeth Hurley Confirms Split From Arun Nayar Amid Cheating Rumors
data.meta_description: Despite this weekend's celebration of love, there was a bit of not-so-happy news: Elizabeth Hurley confirmed her separation from super-rich husband Arun Nayar following reports she cheated with Aussie cricket player Shane Warne. She Continue reading â†’
data.text:
Despite this weekend's celebration of love, there was a bit of not-so-happy news: Elizabeth Hurley confirmed her separation from super-rich husband Arun Nayar following reports she cheated with Aussie cricket player Shane Warne. She tweeted Sunday, "Not a great day. For the record, my husband Arun & I separated a few months ago. Our close family & friends were aware of this."

Meanwhile, Warne -- who has three kids with ex-wife Simone Callahan -- responded to the rumors on his official blog. "Sadly and unfortunately, Simone and I split up a while ago, our closefriends and family were informed at that time. It is a private matterso we did not make it public. We remain friends and will continue to begood parents," wrote the athlete, who has a history of infidelity.

Nayar, an Indian textile heir and businessman, wooed Hurley (ex-girlfriend of Hugh Grant) in 2002 and they married five years later in two lavish ceremonies at Sudeley Castle in England and Umaid Bhawan Palace in India.
